permafrost.tundra.xml.dom

Class NodeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.xml.dom.NodeHelper

  • public final class NodeHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with org.w3c.dom.Node objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private NodeHelper()
      Disallow instantiation of this class.

        Returns:

        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an XML transformation error occurs.

                          javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext namespaceContext,
                          IDataMap output,

        Creates an IData representation of the given Node in the given IDataMap.
        Parameters:
        node - The Node to be parsed.
        namespaceContext - Any namespace declarations used in the XML content.
        output - The IDataMap in which the IData representation is created.
        recurse - If true, child elements will be recursed and returned also.

      • getNodeName

        private static java.lang.String getNodeName(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                            javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext namespaceContext)
        Returns the node name using the prefixes defined in the given namespace context rather than the prefixes used in the parsed XML.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to return the name of.
        namespaceContext - The namespace context to use for prefixing qualified names.
        Returns:
        The name of the node.

      • getValue

        public static java.lang.String getValue(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Returns the value of the given node. If the node is an element, the value returned is the concatenated text from its text and CDATA child nodes.
        Parameters:
        node - A node to return the value of.
        Returns:
        The value of the given node.
